articles.description: Asteroid 2023 BU will zoom over the southern tip of South America at about 7:27 pm EST on Thursday, January 26 (5:57 am IST on Friday, January 27), well within the orbit of geosynchronous satellites.
articles.content: A box truck-sized asteroid is predicted to make a very close encounter with Earth on Friday, January 27, 2023. The asteroid, called 2023 BU, is predicted to pass by Earth at a distance of 3,600 kilom… [+2952 chars]

articles.title: Asteroid 2023 BU: Space rock to pass closer than some satellites - BBC
articles.description: About the size of a bus, the space rock will whip over the southern tip of South America.
articles.content:
You definitely shouldn't panic but there is a biggish asteroid about to pass by Earth in the coming hours.
